See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings InsecureRequestWarning, +  :small_orange_diamond: powerlevel10k - is a fast reimplementation of Powerlevel9k ZSH theme.
"

item.title: add new awk one-liners
item.description: " /usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/urllib3/connectionpool.py:1004: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings InsecureRequestWarning, +###### Search for matching lines +# egrep foo +awk '/foo/' filename +``` +###### Search non matching lines +```bash +# egrep -v foo +awk '!/foo/' filename +``` +###### Print matching lines with numbers +```bash +# egrep -n foo +awk '/foo/{print FNR,$0}' filename +###### Find all the lines longer than 80 characters +```bash +awk 'length($0)>80{print FNR,$0}' filename +``` +###### Print only lines of less than 80 characters +```bash +awk 'length < 80 filename +``` +###### Print double new lines a file +```bash +awk '1; { print "" }' filename +``` +###### Print line numbers +```bash +awk '{ print FNR "\t" $0 }' filename +awk '{ printf("%5d : %s\n", NR, $0) }' filename # in a fancy manner +``` +###### Print line numbers for only non-blank lines +```bash +awk 'NF { $0=++a " :" $0 }; { print }' filename +``` +###### Print the line and the next two (i=5) lines after the line matching regexp +```bash +awk '/foo/{i=5+1;}{if(i){i--; print;}}' filename +``` +###### Print the lines starting at the line matching 'server {' until the line matching '}' +```bash +awk '/server {/,/}/' filename +``` +###### Print multiple columns with separators +```bash +awk -F' ' '{print "ip:\t" $2 "\n port:\t" $3' filename +``` +###### Delete trailing white space (spaces, tabs) +awk '{sub(/[ \t]*$/, "");print}' filename +``` +###### Delete leading white space +```bash +awk '{sub(/^[ \t]+/, ""); print}' filename +``` +###### Remove duplicate consecutive lines +```bash +# uniq +awk 'a !~ $0{print}; {a=$0}' filename +``` +###### Remove duplicate entries in a file without sorting +```bash +awk '!x[$0]++' filename +###### Substitute foo for bar on lines matching regexp +```bash +awk '/regexp/{gsub(/foo/, "bar")};{print}' filename +``` +###### Add some characters at the beginning of matching lines +```bash +awk '/regexp/{sub(/^/, "++++"); print;next;}{print}' filename +``` +###### Print a specific line from a file +###### Remove blank lines from a file and save output to new file +```bash +grep . filename > newfilename +``` "

item.title: add perl one-liners
item.description: " /usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/urllib3/connectionpool.py:1004: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings InsecureRequestWarning, + * [perl](#tool-perl) +##### Tool: [perl](https://www.perl.org/) +###### Search and replace (in place) +```bash +perl -i -pe's/SEARCH/REPLACE/' filename +``` +###### Edit of `*.conf` files changing all foo to bar (and backup original) +```bash +perl -p -i.orig -e 's/\bfoo\b/bar/g' *.conf +``` +###### Prints the first 20 lines from `*.conf` files +```bash +perl -pe 'exit if $. > 20' *.conf +``` +###### Search lines 10 to 20 +```bash +perl -ne 'print if 10 .. 20' filename +``` +###### Delete first 10 lines (and backup original) +```bash +perl -i.orig -ne 'print unless 1 .. 10' filename +``` +###### Delete all but lines between foo and bar (and backup original) +```bash +perl -i.orig -ne 'print unless /^foo$/ .. /^bar$/' filename +``` +###### Reduce multiple blank lines to a single line +```bash +perl -p -i -00pe0 filename +``` +###### Convert tabs to spaces (1t = 2sp) +```bash +perl -p -i -e 's/\t/ /g' filename +``` +###### Read input from a file and report number of lines and characters +```bash +perl -lne '$i++; $in += length($_); END { print "$i lines, $in characters"; }' filename +``` "

item.title: add new stuff + 'Hack Firefox addressbar'
item.description:
" /usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/urllib3/connectionpool.py:1004: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings InsecureRequestWarning, +  :small_orange_diamond: OpenResty - is a dynamic web platform based on NGINX and LuaJIT.
+  :small_orange_diamond: HTTP/2 in Action - an excellent introduction to the new HTTP/2 standard.
+  :small_orange_diamond: Let's code a TCP/IP stack - great stuff to learn network and system programming at a deeper level.
+  :small_orange_diamond: OWASP ProActive Controls - OWASP Top 10 Proactive Controls 2018.
+###### Hack Mozilla Firefox addressbar +In Firefox's addressbar, you can limit results by typing special characters before or after your term: +- `^` - for matches in your browsing history +- `*` - for matches in your bookmarks. +- `%` - for matches in your currently open tabs. +- `#` - for matches in page titles. +- `@` - for matches in web addresses. "

item.title: add new search engines
item.description:
" /usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/urllib3/connectionpool.py:1004: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings InsecureRequestWarning, +  :small_orange_diamond: We Leak Info - world's fastest and largest data breach search engine.
+  :small_orange_diamond: scylla - db dumps and more.
+  :small_orange_diamond: NerdyData - find where any technology is used, across millions of sites.
+  :small_orange_diamond: dehashed - is a hacked database search engine.
+  :small_orange_diamond: Leaked Source - is a collaboration of data found online in the form of a lookup.
+  :small_orange_diamond: RootTheBox - a Game of Hackers (CTF Scoreboard & Game Manager).
+  :small_orange_diamond: CTF Challenge - CTF Web App challenges.
+  :small_orange_diamond: gCTF - most of the challenges used in the Google CTF 2017.
+  :small_orange_diamond: Hack This Site - is a free, safe and legal training ground for hackers.
+  :small_orange_diamond: Attack & Defense - is a browser-based cloud labs.
+  :small_orange_diamond: phrack.org - an awesome collection of articles from several respected hackers and other thinkers.
"
